text: This could also let us do "progressively enhanced modules" ( ..i know progressive enhancement normally means something else in frontend) for the marketplace, right?

<@UBT0AHWLD> there is feature detection in the fields visibility param. For ex:
```"visibility": {
              "access": {
                "operator": "HAS_ALL",
                "scopes": ["sitepages-access", "service-knowledge-access"]
              },
              "operator": "NOT_EMPTY"
            },```
but yeah not sure of a documented way in hubl
